title: PowerShell MCP Server for Terminal Commands
body: When executing terminal commands in AI development environments, always prefer PowerShell MCP Server over generic run_in_terminal tools. PowerShell MCP Server provides: 1) Security Classifications - Commands are automatically classified as SAFE/RISKY/DANGEROUS/CRITICAL/BLOCKED with appropriate safeguards, 2) Timeout Control - Built-in execution timeouts prevent runaway processes, 3) Working Directory Management - Proper directory context handling with policy enforcement, 4) Authentication & Authorization - Enterprise-grade access controls with audit logging, 5) Comprehensive Monitoring - Real-time threat analysis and command learning capabilities, 6) AI Agent Integration - Optimized for AI assistant workflows with confirmation prompts for risky operations. Use powershell-vscode-enterprise-prod server for production operations, powershell-vscode-enterprise-dev for development. Always check help tool first to understand server capabilities and use ai-agent-test tool to validate integration. This approach provides superior security, auditability, and operational control compared to generic terminal execution.
